heading: HR01724
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT TO REALLOCATE  THE AMOUNT OF ONE BILLION PESOS FROM AVAILABLE SAVINGS TO AUGMENT THE ALLOCATIONS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT, SPECIFICALLY FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AMELIORATION ASSISTANCE FOR THE VICTIMS OF THE CONTROVERSIAL DENGVAXIA VACCINES, IN TERMS OF COUNSELLING, MEDICAL AID, AND EMERGENCY ECONOMIC ASSISTANCE TO THE AFFECTED FAMILIES
mother-bill statusstatus: Senate agreed on 2018-09-10 to the request for a conference made by the House on 2018-09-10 Consolidated into HB07449
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01724
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT TO REALLOCATE THE AMOUNT OF ONE BILLION PESOS FROM AVAILABLE SAVINGS TO AUGMENT THE ALLOCATIONS OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT, SPECIFICALLY FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROVIDING AMELIORATION ASSISTANCE FOR THE VICTIMS OF THE CONTROVERSIAL DENGVAXIA VACCINES, IN TERMS OF COUNSELLING, MEDICAL AID, AND EMERGENCY ECONOMIC ASSISTANCE TO THE AFFECTED FAMILIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-26
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-05-22
      2. Approved by the Committee on 2018-05-22
          -House Bill No. 7449 was approved in consolidation with House Joint Resolution Numbered 20 and 21 and House Resolution No. 1724 with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB07449
CONSOLIDATED WITH: HJR0020, HJR0021
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2018-02-28
